mdRecord.dcterms:title: South Gateway
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gardner, Alexander, 1821-1882 (possible)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Glass negative of stereoscopic view of the south lane looking north towards the kitchen. Possibly by Alexander Gardner, 1866-1875. The view shows the closed south lane gate. To the left of the gate is the corn crib where eventually a reconstructed coach house will replace the structure. Remnants of tape are visible along the edges of the glass.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
South Lane
